content: {"name": "El Nido de Esperanza, Washington Heights Ecumenical Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Available only to members who take their parenting class and only accepting families in Washington heights. We are only accepting women who are pregnant   Register online: https://nidodeesperanza.my.site.com/refer/s/ and a social worker will call you to schedule and appointment.\nMore info on the pantry will be discussed after online registration", "email": "", "url": "https://nidodeesperanzanyc.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4111 Broadway", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10033", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8451229, "longitude": -73.9392062}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 368-1117", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Only serves surrounding neighborhood"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers available (must bring birth certificate)"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
